price: Farao kaa sε: “Moagye no adi wͻ aberε a me mmaa mo kwan? Nokorε sε, ͻne mo panin a ͻkyerεε mo ntafowa yie. Enti mɛtwitwa mo nsa ne mo nan abͻ no abira na mabͻ mo asennua mu wͻ akyeresua dua ho, ama moahu nokorε sε, yεn mu nea ͻwͻ asotwee a, ano yε den, na εkyε“.
arabic: قَالَ ءَامَنتُمۡ لَهُۥ قَبۡلَ أَنۡ ءَاذَنَ لَكُمۡۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكَبِيرُكُمُ ٱلَّذِي عَلَّمَكُمُ ٱلسِّحۡرَۖ فَلَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيۡدِيَكُمۡ وَأَرۡجُلَكُم مِّنۡ خِلَٰفٖ وَلَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمۡ فِي جُذُوعِ ٱلنَّخۡلِ وَلَتَعۡلَمُنَّ أَيُّنَآ أَشَدُّ عَذَابٗا وَأَبۡقَىٰ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla āmantum lahu qabla an ādhana lakum innahu lakabīrukumu alladhī ʿallamakumu al-siḥ'ra fala-uqaṭṭiʿanna aydiyakum wa-arjulakum min khilāfin wala-uṣallibannakum fī judhūʿi al-nakhli walataʿlamunna ayyunā ashaddu ʿadhāban wa-abqā
translations: So surely I will cut off
and surely I will crucify you
